markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winglets](/Feats.aspx?ID=5621) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Through the lingering influence of your warren's patron, you've sprouted a small set of wings. While not suitable for full flight, these weak wings can help you jump further with a small flap. When [Leaping](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) horizontally, you move an additional 5 feet. This additional distance isn't cumulative with the increased Leap distance from the [Powerful Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=5189) feat. In addition, when you attempt a [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378), you can jump a distance up to 10 feet farther than you normally would based on the result of your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check, though you still can't jump farther than your Speed. You don't automatically fail your checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) or Long Jump if you don't Stride at least 10 feet first.

<title level="2">Winglets leads to...</title>
[Winglet Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=5627)
name: Winglets
